name: Space Wrath (aswearin)
description:
Space Wrath is a  survival chance & probability game suited for 2 - 4 players where each player will defend their own space colony from the attacks that the universe will send.  For all turns, players will try to take the least amount of damage as possible. This process of defending  continues until there is one final survivor left, or if players draw, final survivors.

https://playingcards.io/7mhvya
